<div class="bothcols" key="publicbody"><p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">REPORT GIVEN BY</u>: JOE WALL - PLANNING MANAGER</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">ISSUE BEFORE COUNCIL</u>:&nbsp;Should City Council annex approximately a 0.65-acre parcel, located at 2972 S. 6th Street, east of Washburn Way and west of Austin Street?</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">SUMMARY AND BACKGROUND</u>:</p>

<p>The applicant, 2972 South 6th Street, LLC, proposes to bring a .65-acre parcel, described as Parcel 1 of Land Partition 6-11 into City limits to facilitate certain retail uses. The subject property is surrounded by City limits on all 4 sides. Use and build-out of the subject property will remain similar after annexation if approved. Any future commercial development proposed for the site will need to obtain Design Review approval and meet all current City development standards.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>The address of the subject property is 2972 S 6th Street and the property can be further described as Map/Tax Lot R-3909-003BC-01001-000.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>The property is currently zoned General Commercial (CG), a Klamath County Land Development Code zoning designation. Per Community Development Ordinance (CDO) Section 13.140, properties annexed into the City shall be assigned City zoning per the Jurisdictional Zoning Comparison Chart contained in the CDO. The chart shows that properties zoned CG in the County should be zoned General Commercial (GC) upon annexation to the City.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">On April 22, 2019, the Planning Commission held a public hearing and reviewed the annexation Review Criteria listed below and the proposed staff findings. The Planning Commission accepted staff’s findings and unanimously recommended approval of the requested annexation to City Council. A summary version of the April 22, 2019 Planning Commission meeting minutes are attached to this Agenda Report.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; page-break-after: avoid; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">RELEVANT REVIEW CRITERIA, FACTS AND ANALYSIS:</span></span></span></u></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">T<span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">his proposal is being reviewed according to the provisions of the Klamath Falls Community Development Ordinance (CDO) (Chapters 10 to 14), specifically, </span><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Sections 13.105-13.150, regarding Annexation.</span></span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Criterion:</span></u><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"> The annexation conforms to the Comprehensive Plan.</span></span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The Annexation will not encroach upon agricultural ground.</span></b></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Response:&nbsp;</span></u>This annexation will not encroach upon agricultural ground. The property is located along S 6th Street, a major commercial corridor. The property has been previously developed for commercial use under Klamath County jurisdiction.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will not encroach upon forestland.</span></b></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Response:</span></u>&nbsp;This annexation will not encroach upon forestland. The property is located along S 6th Street, a major commercial corridor. The property has been previously developed for commercial use under Klamath County jurisdiction.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will help conserve open space and protect natural resources.</b> </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Response:</span></u><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">&nbsp;</span>Except for the subject property, the properties on both side of S 6th Street are entirely within the City limits from Main Street (west end) to Austin Street (east end). While the property has been previously developed and used for commercial uses under Klamath County jurisdiction, the requested annexation will help to ensure that future development and uses on the property are consistent with the types of developments occurring on other GC zoned properties in the vicinity. The proposed annexation will help to facilitate the reuse and redevelopment of this property in an area with existing urban infrastructure which helps to conserve open space and natural resources by limiting sprawl.&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will not adversely affect the quality of the community’s air, water and land resources.</b> </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">R</span></u><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">esponse:</span></u><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"> </span><span style="margin: 0px;">As stated above, the proposed annexation will help to facilitate the reuse and redevelopment of this property in an area with existing urban infrastructure. The reuse/redevelopment of existing commercial sites helps to protect the community’s air quality by reducing sprawl and vehicle miles traveled. It also helps to protect the community’s water and land resources by preserving rural, undeveloped lands in their natural state. </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will not endanger life or property from natural disasters or hazards.</b> </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Response:</span></u><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">&nbsp;</span>The property is located in an area with existing commercial development. The land is flat, outside of any mapped floodplain, and not particularly prone to natural disasters of hazards. Any future development of the property will be reviewed for consistency with building codes and all other applicable regulations related to natural hazard mitigation. This annexation will not endanger life or property from natural disaster or hazards.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will help satisfy the citizen’s recreation needs.</b> </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Re</span></u><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><u>s</u>ponse:</span></u><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">&nbsp;</span>Not applicable. This property will neither enhance nor detract from citizens’ recreation needs.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will help satisfy the community’s housing need.</b> </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Response:</span></u>&nbsp;Through the requested annexation and concurrent assignment of the GC zoning designation, the subject property will be available for the kinds of development permitted within the GC zone in the City. Permitted uses include a wide range of both commercial uses and residential densities/types. It is possible the property could be redeveloped to meet a portion of the community’s housing needs.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will diversify and improve the community economy.</b> </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Response:</span></u> Through the requested annexation and concurrent assignment of the GC zoning designation, the subject property will be available for the kinds of development permitted within the GC zone in the City. Permitted uses include a wide range of both commercial uses and residential densities/types. Use and build-out of the subject property will remain similar after annexation if approved. Any future commercial development proposed for the site will need to obtain Design Review approval and meet all current City development standards. The proposed annexation will help to facilitate the reuse and redevelopment of this property in an area with existing urban infrastructure.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>The requested annexation is supported by several goals and policies within the Economy element of the Comprehensive plan. These policies support diversifying and improving the local economy, supporting development that will help to assure the City of an adequate tax base, and a continued analysis and review of land use needs of the urban area. The requested annexation will aide in diversifying and improving the economy of the community.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will create a timely, orderly, and efficient arrangement of public facilities and services.</b> </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Response:</span></u><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">&nbsp;</span>The property is located along S 6th Street, a major commercial corridor with existing public facilities and infrastructure. Notice of the proposed annexation was sent to public and private utility providers. Those agencies that responded presented no concerns related to the proposed annexation or the ability to provide service to the types of uses permitted in the GC zone.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will help provide a safe, convenient and economic transportation system. </span></b></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">R</span></u><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">esponse:</span></u><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">&nbsp;</span>The property is located along S 6th Street, a major commercial corridor. The proposed annexation is not anticipated to have any effect on the existing transportation system in the vicinity.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will aid in conserving energy.</b> </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Response:</span></u>&nbsp;While the property has been previously developed and used for commercial uses under Klamath County jurisdiction, the requested annexation will help to ensure that future development and uses on the property are consistent with the types of developments occurring on other GC zoned properties in the vicinity. The proposed annexation will help to facilitate the reuse and redevelopment of this property in an area with existing urban infrastructure which helps to conserve energy by limiting the amount of additional infrastructure that needs to be developed and by limiting vehicle miles traveled.<span 12pt="" new="" style="margin: 0px; line-height: 115%; font-family:;" times=""> </span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation will promote an orderly and efficient transition from rural to urban land uses. </span></b></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Response:</span></u><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"> </span></span>The requested annexation is supported by several goals and policies within the Urbanization element of the Comprehensive plan. The policies of the Urbanization element support the orderly transition from rural to urban uses, the utilization of lands within the Urban Growth Boundary (UGB) for urban development, and the promotion of in-fill development in areas with existing transportation infrastructure and utility services. The proposed annexation will help to facilitate the reuse and redevelopment of this property in an area with existing urban infrastructure. The proposed annexation is consistent with the policies of the Comprehensive Plan that encourage an orderly transition of properties within the UGB to urban development through annexation and appropriate development controls (through zoning).</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">City Surveyor Comments –</span></b></span></p>

<p>GENERAL INFORMATION &amp; FACTS:</p>

<p>The property in question is shown as Assessor Map Reference 3909-03BC Tax Lot 1001 and further identified as Parcel 1 of Land Partition 6-11 recorded in the Klamath County Clerk’s Office. The applicant is requesting annexation into the City Limits of Klamath Falls. The process requires review by City of Klamath Falls staff and approval by the City of Klamath Falls City Council and the Oregon Department of Revenue (DOR).</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>COMMENTS &amp; CONDITIONS</u>:</p>

<ol>
	<li>The proposed and approved boundary change shall comply with the City of Klamath Falls Community Development Ordinances (CDO’s)/Codes (more particularly; CDO Chapter 13, Sections 13.105 through 13.150), the Boundary Change Information requirements per the Oregon DOR, Oregon Revised Statute (ORS) 308.225 and any other conditions noted by the City of Klamath Falls Planning Division.</li>
	<li>The State of Oregon requires that a proposed and final approved boundary change shall be approved by City Council, being the appropriate boundary authority, through order, ordinance (per City of Klamath Falls), or resolution with required descriptions and maps.</li>
	<li>A boundary change description and map shall be prepared in accordance with ORS 308.225(2)(b). The City Surveyor requests that any description and map not prepared, signed and stamped by a Professional Land Surveyor licensed in the State of Oregon shall then be reviewed and approved by such Professional prior to forwarding to City Planning and the DOR. The applicant may also request the City Planning Manager to prepare those documents (description &amp; map), by the City Surveyor and City Engineering Division, at a not to exceed determined amount.</li>
	<li>A signed copy of the order, ordinance (per City of Klamath Falls), or resolution must be submitted to the DOR with the descriptions and maps for review and approval.</li>
	<li>There are three potential errors that may be found by the DOR in their review of the ordinance, description and map. Those are classified as; Typographical errors, Minor error and Major error. Note that, any boundary change information that has to be corrected for any reason requires a correcting order, ordinance, or resolution from the appropriate boundary authority (City of Klamath Falls Council).</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>As stated above under the City Surveyor Comments, there are certain steps that must be taken to insure the proposed annexation complies with the City of Klamath Falls Community Development Ordinances/Codes and the Boundary Change Information requirements per the Oregon Department of Revenue and Oregon Revised Statute (ORS) 308.225. By following the comments and conditions outlined by the City Surveyor, the applicant can insure the proposed annexation meets applicable standards for the City and the Oregon DOR.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><u style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Proposed Finding:</span></u></b><span style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;"> <b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">The annexation conforms to the Comprehensive Plan.</b> <b style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">This criterion is met with the conditions stated above under City Surveyor Comments.</b></span></p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><u style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">COUNCIL OPTION(S)</u>:</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><strong style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Option 1 (approve as proposed):</strong><br style="font-family: Verdana,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box;">
a) Move to accept the proposed findings as presented by staff and recommended by Planning Commission.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">b) Move to approve the requested annexation based on the accepted findings.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><strong style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Option 2 (approve with modifications):</strong><br style="font-family: Verdana,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box;">
a) Move to modify the proposed findings to mitigate a concern (identify proposed modifications).<br style="font-family: Verdana,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box;">
b) Move to approve the requested annexation based on the modified findings.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><strong style="font: 700 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; box-sizing: border-box; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;">Option 3 (denial):</strong><br style="font-family: Verdana,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box;">
a) Move to direct staff to modify the proposed findings to support denial of the proposed annexation based on direction from the Council.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">b) Move to deny the requested annexation based on the modified findings.</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font: 400 11px/normal Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px rgb(51, 51, 51); border-image: none; text-align: left; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; box-sizing: border-box; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; background-color: transparent; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">&nbsp;</p>

<div class="leftcol">Subject</div>
<div class="rightcol" id="ai-name"><span class="agendanumber">6.1 </span>LIQUOR LICENSE RECOMMENDATION FOR LIMITED ON-PREMISES SALES FOR NINE THAI RESTAURANT LOCATED AT 1737 AVALON STREET</div>
<div class="leftcol">Type</div>
<div class="rightcol">Action</div>
<div class="leftcol">Recommended Action</div>
<div class="rightcol">- Hold a Public Hearing.<br>- Move to recommend the allowance of limited on-premises liquor sales to the OLCC for Nine Thai Restaurant located at 1737 Avalon Street.</div>
<div class="leftcol">Goals</div>
<div class="rightcol" id="goals-viewer">
<a class="goal" unique="AW934Y6FE44C"><div class="name">Goal #2 - Customer Service</div></a>

<br><br>
<div class="bothcols" key="publicbody"><p><u>REPORT GIVEN BY</u>: JOE WALL - PLANNING MANAGER</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>ISSUE BEFORE COUNCIL</u>: Should Council recommend a limited on-premises Liquor License for Nine Thai Restaurant?</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>SUMMARY AND BACKGROUND</u>:</p>

<p>Nine Thai Restaurant, through owners Parichat and Tanya Dhevaphalin, is applying for a new outlet Liquor License to allow limited on-premises sales at their newly opened restaurant located at 1737 Avalon Street. This would allow the sale of malt beverages, beer, wine, and cider for consumption at the licensed business.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>The new restaurant establishment recently opened in the Klamath Falls Town Center in space previously occupied by Skippers restaurant.&nbsp; The business location is zoned General Commercial and the operation of a retail outlet is consistent with the zoning. The business is open from 11 a.m. until 9 p.m. Sunday through Thursday, and from 11 a.m. until 10 p.m. on Friday and Saturday. The business will not restrict entrance by age so the Adult Business Overlay Zone (CDO 12.490-12.496) does not come into effect.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Notice was sent on April 10, 2019, to adjacent property owners within a 100-foot radius of the business location and no responses have been received. The Police Department also reviewed the request and noted no disqualifying information.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>COUNCIL OPTION(S)</u>:</p>

<ol>
	<li>Move to make a recommendation to the OLCC for the allowance of limited on-premises sales for Nine Thai Restaurant.</li>
	<li>Move to recommend denial to the OLCC for limited on-premises sales for Nine Thai Restaurant.</li>
</ol>

<p><u>FINANCIAL IMPACT(S)</u>:&nbsp;There is no financial impact related to making a recommendation to the OLCC.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>STAFF’S RECOMMENDATION</u>:&nbsp;Council to approve Option 1.</p>

<h2>Agenda Item Details</h2>
<div class="leftcol">Meeting</div>
<div class="rightcol">May 06, 2019 - AGENDA FOR COUNCIL MEETING</div>
<div class="leftcol">Category</div>
<div class="rightcol"><span class="agendanumber">7. </span>LEGISLATIVE ACTIONS</div>
<div class="leftcol">Subject</div>
<div class="rightcol" id="ai-name"><span class="agendanumber">7.1 </span>CONSTRUCTION SERVICES CONTRACT WITH VSS INTERNATIONAL, INC. FOR THE 2019 SLURRY SEAL PROJECT IN THE NOT-TO-EXCEED AMOUNT OF $350,256.37</div>
<div class="leftcol">Type</div>
<div class="rightcol">Action</div>
<div class="leftcol">Recommended Action</div>
<div class="rightcol">- Move to authorize staff to enter into a construction services contract with VSS International, Inc. for the 2019 Slurry Seal Project in the not-to-exceed amount of $350,256.37 and authorize an additional not-to-exceed contingency allowance of $17,513.</div>
<div class="leftcol">Goals</div>
<div class="rightcol" id="goals-viewer">
<a class="goal" unique="AW93576FF269"><div class="name">Goal #3 - Economic Viability/Community Livability</div></a>
</div>
<br><br>
<div class="bothcols" key="publicbody"><p><u>REPORT GIVEN BY</u>: SCOTT SOUDERS - CITY ENGINEER</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>ISSUE BEFORE COUNCIL</u>: Should the City execute a construction services contract with VSS International, Inc. in the not-to-exceed amount of $350,256.37 for construction of the 2019 Slurry Seal Project?</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>SUMMARY AND BACKGROUND</u>:</p>

<p>In 2017, staff introduced an additional roadway treatment alternative to their surface restoration options. Modified Slurry Seal is a blend of quick setting asphalt emulsion, water, high quality aggregate, and additives that has zero emissions, is applied cold, and can be ready for traffic in approximately one hour. The treatment provides similar benefits as a traditional chip seal application, but limits inconvenience to the motoring public, is more conducive to bicycle traffic, and presents a more aesthetic appearance to the roadway system. The attached project location exhibit illustrates the locations scheduled to be treated within the construction services contract. If approved, the summer 2019 project will treat roughly 17 lane miles.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>A formal request for construction bids was publicly advertised in the Herald and News and the Daily Journal of Commerce. A non-mandatory pre-bid meeting was held on February 12, 2019 where bidders had the opportunity to discuss the project with staff. Bids were received from three companies on February 21, 2019. The bidders and their prices are summarized below.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><span style="font-size: 11px;"><u>Engineers Estimate (Published) $320,000 - $340,000</u></span></strong></p>

<p>Telfer Pavement Technologies LLC&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; $835,821.05</p>

<p><strong>VSS International, Inc.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; $589,120.00</strong></p>

<p>Intermountain Slurry Seal, Inc.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; $776,000.00</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Due to an underestimation and late modification of the scope associated with roadway striping, all bids came in higher than originally estimated and were above the budgeted funds allocated for this project. Staff entered negotiations with VSS International, Inc. in order to value engineer the project within budget. By removing a portion of the area to be surfaced (see exhibit area options 1 &amp; 2) and City self-performing a portion of the striping work, the negotiated bid price was reduced to $350,256.37. Staff reviewed all documents submitted and determined the negotiated bid from VSS International, Inc. was acceptable.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>COUNCIL OPTION(S)</u>:</p>

<ol>
	<li>Approve a Contract with VSS International, Inc. in an amount not-to-exceed $350,256.37 and authorize an additional not-to-exceed contingency allowance of $17,513.</li>
	<li>Reject a Contract with VSS International, Inc., modify the project scope and rebid the project.</li>
	<li>Reject a Contract with VSS International, Inc. and postpone the project.</li>
</ol>

<p><u>FINANCIAL IMPACT(S)</u>:</p>

<p>Design Phase and Bid Phase hard cost expenditures are anticipated to total approximately $1,025. Staff anticipates an additional hard cost allowance of $4,000 for construction inspection and materials testing during construction. The total anticipated hard cost project expenditure equals $371,769, including a 5% construction contingency allowance if necessary. Refer to the attached Budget Analysis Form for further detail. It should be noted that the charges for internal staff time are not included in the overall hard cost budget as these services are provided through the General Fund.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Funds for this project are available through the City’s FY 2018/19 Adopted Budget in the Street Division Capital Outlay Fund for Slurry Seal in the amount $350,000. An additional $25,000 will be allocated out of the Streets Capital Outlay Bridge Maintenance Fund to offset the anticipated shortfall.</p>

<ol>
	<li>Council Option 1 will utilize funds available for this project.</li>
	<li>Council Option 2 will delay the project into next fiscal year.</li>
	<li>Council Option 3 will cancel the project for construction for the anticipated fiscal year.</li>
</ol>

<p><u>STAFF’S RECOMMENDATION</u>: Council to approve Option 1.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p style="text-align: justify; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>AGENDA SENT TO</u>:</p>

<p style="text-align: justify; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="line-height: normal;">- VSS International, Inc.</span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>DOCUMENT(S) ATTACHED</u>:</p>

<p>- Project Location Exhibit</p>

<p>- Budget Analysis Form</p>

<p>- Notice of Intent to Award</p>

<p>- Sample Contract</p>
</div>

<div class="leftcol">Type</div>

<div class="bothcols" key="publicbody"><p><u>REPORT GIVEN BY</u>: JOHN BARSALOU - AIRPORT DIRECTOR</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>ISSUE BEFORE COUNCIL</u>:&nbsp;Should the City submit a grant application to the FAA and accept the grant, if offered, in the estimated amount of $6,707,046 for the Taxiway G Reconstruction Project?</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>SUMMARY AND BACKGROUND</u>:</p>

<p>The Airport and the FAA have identified Taxiway G, the primary parallel taxiway to Runway 14-32, for a full length rehabilitation due to a majority of the taxiway having a Pavement Condition Rating (PCR) of "Very Poor".&nbsp; The rehabilitation of Taxiway G will include a new asphalt surface, new pavement markings, replacement of 12' of asphalt millings shoulders, construction of under drains, replacement of edge lighting cable, edge lights, airfield guidance signs and relocation of Runway 32 secondary windcone.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>The FAA has the Airport programed to receive an Airport Improvement Project (AIP)&nbsp;grant this Federal Fiscal Year which ends September 30.&nbsp;&nbsp;The&nbsp;FAA issues AIP grants based on actual costs and the Airport has been waiting for&nbsp;bids to be opened to finalize our grant application.&nbsp; Bids for the reconstruction of Taxiway G were opened on April 18 and costs for the project including environmental, design, construction and administration total $7,154,183.&nbsp; Under the AIP program the FAA provides 93.75% ($6,707,046) of the project costs with the Airport contributing 6.25% ($447,137) in matching funds.</p>

<h2>Agenda Item Details</h2>
<div class="leftcol">Meeting</div>
<div class="rightcol">May 06, 2019 - AGENDA FOR COUNCIL MEETING</div>
<div class="leftcol">Category</div>
<div class="rightcol"><span class="agendanumber">7. </span>LEGISLATIVE ACTIONS</div>
<div class="leftcol">Subject</div>
<div class="rightcol" id="ai-name"><span class="agendanumber">7.3 </span>CONSTRUCTION SERVICES CONTRACT WITH ROCKY MOUNTAIN CONSTRUCTION FOR THE AIRPORT TAXIWAY G RECONSTRUCTION PROJECT IN THE AMOUNT OF $5,969,378 WITH NOTICE TO PROCEED DEPENDENT ON RECEIVING THE FAA FUNDING</div>
<div class="leftcol">Type</div>
<div class="rightcol">Action</div>
<div class="leftcol">Recommended Action</div>
<div class="rightcol">- Move to authorize staff to execute contract with Rocky Mountain Construction in the amount of $5,969,378 <br> for the Airport Taxiway G Reconstruction Project, and for staff to issue the Notice to Proceed dependent on receiving FAA funding.</div>
<div class="leftcol">Goals</div>
<div class="rightcol" id="goals-viewer">
<a class="goal" unique="AW934Y6FE44C"><div class="name">Goal #2 - Customer Service</div></a>
</div>
<br><br>
<div class="bothcols" key="publicbody"><p><u>REPORT GIVEN BY</u>: JOHN BARSALOU - AIRPORT DIRECTOR</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>ISSUE BEFORE COUNCIL</u>: Should the City award the bid for the Taxiway G Reconstruction Project to Rocky Mountain Construction in the amount of $5,969,378?</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>SUMMARY AND BACKGROUND</u>:</p>

<p>The Airport and the FAA have identified Taxiway G, the primary parallel taxiway to Runway 14-32, for a full length rehabilitation due to a majority of the taxiway having a Pavement Condition Rating (PCR) of "Very Poor".&nbsp; The rehabilitation of Taxiway G will include a new asphalt surface, new pavement markings, replacement of 12' of asphalt millings shoulders, construction of under drains, replacement of edge lighting cable, edge lights, airfield guidance signs and relocation of Runway 32 secondary windcone.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Council approved a contract with Mead &amp; Hunt on September 17, 2018 for the design of the project.&nbsp;&nbsp;The FAA approved the plans and specifications and authorized the project to go out to bid&nbsp;in March of this year.&nbsp; An invitation to bid was published in the Daily Journal of Commerce on March 15th and 18th, and the following bid was received by the bid deadline of April 18th:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin-left: 40px;">Rocky Mountain Construction - $5,969,378</p>

<p style="margin-left: 40px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p>Only one bid was received which, while not preferred, was expected as Rocky Mountain Construction is the only large scale paving contractor that has their own asphalt plant locally.&nbsp; This gives them a bid advantage over out-of-town contractors.&nbsp; The bid was 3.75% higher than the engineer's estimate of $5,752,934 but within the range of the overall project budget.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>An FAA Airport Improvement Project (AIP) program grant will fund 93.75% ($5,596,292) of the bid&nbsp;with a local match of 6.25% ($373,086) coming&nbsp;from budgeted Airport funds.&nbsp; Notice to Proceed for the project will be dependent on the Airport receiving an AIP grant from the FAA for this project.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>COUNCIL OPTION(S)</u>:</p>

<ol>
	<li>Accept Rocky Mountain Construction's bid.</li>
	<li>Reject Rocky Mountain Construction's bid and rebid the project.</li>
	<li>Reject Rocky Mountain Construction's bid and abandon plans for the reconstruction of Taxiway G.</li>
</ol>

<p><u>FINANCIAL IMPACT(S)</u>:</p>

<p>An FAA Airport Improvement Project (AIP) program grant will fund 93.75% ($5,596,292) of the bid&nbsp;with a local match of 6.25% ($373,086) from budgeted Airport funds completing the total funding needed.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>STAFF’S RECOMMENDATION</u>: Council to approve Option 1.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>AGENDA SENT TO</u>:</p>

<p>- Rocky Mountain Construction</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>DOCUMENT(S) ATTACHED</u>:</p>

<p>- Draft Contract with Rocky Mountain Construction</p>
</div>
